sentences: Gabriel Antonio Cruz Padilla (born 1981 in Bayam√≥n, Puerto Rico), popularly known as Wise or ("Wise" The Gold Pen, formerly Wise Da 'Gangsta'), is a composer, singer and producer in Puerto Rico.

Currently, WISE is heard on international radios with new hits under his authorship, such as "Hoy lo siento", a song that has become the most played on nationwide radio, occupying the first positions internationally interpreted by Zion and Lennox feat.
